Description: We are looking for Housekeeping Attendants and Supervisors (Females)A luxury hotel in Bahrain is looking for experienced housekeeping attendants and supervisors with 5-star background experience.We are seeking Southeast Asian, African, and European nationalities who are passionate about providing exceptional service to our guests.Skills
